Row.Text: Night Parade of 100 Oni
The youkai Nurarihyon has come to us, desiring to lead a night parade of oni through nearby lands. Any humans that were to come across his procession would surely be killed or spirited away.[NEWLINE]
Let's provide him with funds, so that he may recruit oni for the parade!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose {1_GoldCost} [ICON_GOLD] Gold.[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a free melee unit in each city.[ENDCOLOR]
We have provided Nurarihyon with funds, and he has recruited a large number of oni for his procession!
Nurarihyon will have to recruit for his parade on his own.

[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Each city with more than 3 population has a 50% chance of gaining a free untrained melee unit.[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Lose 1 population from each city that produces a free unit.[ENDCOLOR]
Nurarihyon has recruited oni interested in joining his procession from some of our cities.
We should just have a celebration here instead!
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Start a golden age.[ENDCOLOR]
We have decided to celebrate here instead!
Rumor has it that the youkai Nurarihyon is recruiting oni for a night parade.
Nurarihyon
New Ingredients Found!
The brewers in {1_City} claim to have found some new ingredients for brewing alcohol. While not as good as the sake from a sake bug, it may at least provide some variety in our drink![NEWLINE]
What are we waiting for? Let's get brewing!
[NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]A source of [ICON_RES_WINE] Wine, [ICON_RES_CITRUS] Citrus, or [ICON_RES_SUGAR] Sugar appears near {1_City}.[ENDCOLOR]
A new source of {1_Icon} {2_Res} has been found near {3_City}!
A Kishin Chief Appears!

The powers that be have determined that {1_Name}, the ruler of {2_Civ}, has extended their lifespan to an unnatural degree. A kishin chief has been assigned to send them on to the afterlife, and has requested our assistance.[NEWLINE]
We should assist the kishin, and help uphold the natural order.
[ICON_BULLET][COLOR_NEGATIVE_TEXT]Be denounced by {1_Civ}.[ENDCOLOR] [NEWLINE][ICON_BULLET][COLOR_POSITIVE_TEXT]Gain a Kishin Chief unit in the capital.[ENDCOLOR]
We have offered our assistance to the kishin chief, although we have been denounced for it.
The kishin chief will have to perform their mission on their own.
[ICON_BULLET]Nothing[ENDCOLOR]
The kishin chief has left to continue their mission on their own.
